content.description: Use one of many variations to climb the large block leaning against middle of the cliff. It is useful to clean the top holds on either side.
content.location: It is in the middle of the cliff.

content.description: Slime Time ascends a slightly less than vertical slab. Some of the holds have a slime on them that still wouldn't go away after much scrubbing. Stand start right of the block on crimps and the small ledge at the base of the rock. Work up and slightly to the left on crimps and delicate feet. You can make this easier by stemming with the block, but it's more fun without. There's probably a harder sit start.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is inclined and slippery. Don't fall on the topout.
content.location: It is directly to the right of the Swamp Block.

content.description: Climb the good flakes in the channel to the left of the block.
content.protection: A pad. This has a slightly sloped/loamy landing.
content.location: It is directly left of the Swamp Block.

content.description: Swamp Slab is a slightly less-than-vertical slab with a big block leaning on the middle section. The rock is a bit chossy. Much like most of the surrounding area, this spot is very buggy.
